alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 25 at 2:08PM MST until July 25 at 2:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 245 PM MST. * At 208 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near South Mountain Park to near Sun Lakes to near Seville to near San Tan Mountain Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 151 and 176. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 187. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 139 and 173. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville, Freestone Park, South Mountain Park, Bapchule, Fiesta Mall and Sky Harbor Airport. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
